subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: When Royce Waltman was fired as the coach at Indiana State, he observed that it is better to get fired for cheating than for losing. He has not been rehired as a head coach.
snippet: When Royce Waltman was fired as the coach at Indiana State, he observed that it is better to get fired for cheating than for losing. He has not been rehired as a head coach.
